meanings.definition: Able to thrive in a wide range of environmental conditions.
meanings.sent1: The eurytopic plant grew well in both sunny and shady areas.
meanings.sent2: The eurytopic animal could survive in different climates.
meanings.sent3: The eurytopic flower decided to bloom everywhere just to show off!
meanings.sent4: Her eurytopic nature was like a chameleon, blending seamlessly into any setting.
meanings.sent5: The eurytopic tree's adaptability made it the star of the forest.

meanings.definition: Organisms that are adaptable to various habitats.
meanings.sent1: Eurytopic organisms can live in many different places on Earth.
meanings.sent2: The eurytopic thrived in both the desert and the rainforest.
meanings.sent3: The eurytopic creature decided to take a vacation to every habitat on the planet!
meanings.sent4: The eurytopic species was like a world traveler, exploring every corner of the globe.
meanings.sent5: The eurytopic animal's versatility was truly remarkable.
